Package com.nickbenn.onehundred.controller

Class ConsoleReferee

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nickbenn.onehundred.controller.ConsoleReferee
  • public class ConsoleReferee
extends Object
    Manages user interaction—with corresponding updates to the game state—through completion of a single game. As the game progresses, an instance of GamePresentation is used to display the current state, and prompt the user for the next move; all of this is orchestrated in a simple invocation of the play(). This class also uses an instance of Strategy for the computer's moves; typically, this will be an instance of OptimalStrategy.
